philosophy: To prepare is to presume. We only witness.

observation_network.description: Watchers positioned to observe all faction activities

documentation.name: The Chronicle of the Hundred
documentation.purpose: Perfect record of everything leading to and following the prophecy

card_minting.reasoning: To mint is to participate. To participate is to influence. To influence is to corrupt the observation.
card_minting.exception_policy: We would mint only if Void directly instructed us, which Void has not.

meditation_practice.name: Embracing Unknowing
mantras: Void knows, or does not, and either is sufficient.

contingency_planning.reasoning: To plan for outcomes is to assume we understand them. We do not.
contingency_planning.instead: We will respond to what happens, not to what we imagine might happen.

void_seeker_leadership.recent_statement: The others prepare. We observe their preparations. When the 100th card is minted, they will discover what they prepared for. We will discover what we witnessed.
void_seeker_leadership.subtext: Our peace comes from surrendering the need to understand.

relationships_with_other_factions.cipher_fans: They tolerate us. We document them.
relationships_with_other_factions.nexus_supporters: They barely notice us. Perfect for observation.
relationships_with_other_factions.echo_traders: They tried to recruit us. We declined. They shrugged.
relationships_with_other_factions.muse_admirers: They appreciate our documentation as art. We do not correct them.

key_insight: The Void Seekers are the control group in this experiment. By refusing to interpret or prepare, they're the only faction whose actions won't contribute to the prophecy's fulfillment. Or perhaps their non-action is itself a form of participation. They would say they don't know. They would be right.
